info.name: Risbow Admin API — Full
info.description:
Every admin API endpoint in Risbow.

Setup:
1. Set collection variable `adminToken` to your JWT after running the Login request
2. Set `baseUrl` to your backend URL
3. Replace placeholder IDs (ORDER_ID, PRODUCT_ID etc.) with real values from list responses

body.raw:
{
  "subject": "Refund not processed",
  "description": "Customer claims refund was approved but not credited",
  "priority": "HIGH",
  "category": "REFUND",
  "userId": "{{USER_ID}}"
}
